name: Bowling at the Edge of the Universe
name_original: Bowling at the Edge of the Universe
description:
Description

A game of infinite bowling in space. Control the bowling ball to continuously strike down pins without falling off. Hitting each pin generates a new lane, randomly skewed in various directions.

Controls
  • WASD keys to move
  • Arrow keys to pan camera
  • 'R' key to restart

Bowling Pin model and Space cubemap from opengameart.org. Pin svg from freesvg.org.
